description:
With Mouri Motonari showing his true colors, Nobunaga, Kenshin, and Shingen temporarily call a truce to work together to take the pirate on. However, the storm that has suddenly rolled in is not any normal storm. Items of Sasuke`s seem to disappear with the suspicious lightning and Sasuke is forced to make a bold confession to his historical companions.
Source: crunchyroll
